At a time when politicians at the local and state levels have ceded to the violent anarchists harming our children, destroying our cities, and fueling the flames of anger and unrest that threaten to tear apart the fabric of our society, now more than ever, we need leaders...

Our Founding Fathers believed that rights come from God - not government - and that all men are created equal. These two revolutionary beliefs are the bonds that unite Americans still today. #IndependenceDay🇺🇸

Each day, our brave men and women in uniform risk life and limb here at home and across the globe to preserve and defend that freedom. It is because of their sacrifice that America remains a shining city on a hill. #IndependenceDay🇺🇸

This weekend, we celebrate the birth of our nation and the gift of independence. Throughout the history of mankind, freedom has been the exception. And yet, here in America, freedom has been delivered and defended for every man, women, and child. #IndependenceDay🇺🇸

In writing the Declaration of Independence, the Founders put forth a bold set of ideals that would lay the foundation of our great democracy. Today, as we celebrate our independence and freedom’s blessings, let us also continue the work of building a more perfect union 🇺🇸

True patriotism means we must unequivocally commit to doing the work—day in and day out—of uprooting racism.

The America of our greatest imaginations is within our reach. And it's on all of us to fight for it.

My hope is that we all take this Fourth of July to reflect on our history and commit to the work that needs to be done so Black Americans and people of color can live free of oppression. 

White supremacy has shaped so much of our story—but we can write a new chapter together.
